name: 27k The music driven game
description:
27k is more than a space shooter: it's a glorious adventure driven by epic music that take place inside Clyria h72, the wealthiest galaxy of the entire universe. 

More and more planets are becoming uninhabitable, destroying the once peaceful environments and forcing their inhabitants to leave them. 
Your space expedition throughout Clyria has become necessary when these mysterious facts turned into very dangerous.
The truth must be revealed and the responsible must be punished for these atrocities. Many men will try to obstacle your vital mission, fight till the end to save thousands of innocent lives! 

During a match shoot to you opponent following the music's beats and gain points.
Spend these to activate special upgrade-cards called Potex that give you different advantages during the match.
Each map is a different planet of the Clyria galaxy, with a different music playing.

Offline mode works on touch devices only.
